name: Military Cargo Truck City
description:
Military Cargo Truck City is on the road and ready to be explored by extremely experienced truck drivers. Set behind the wheels and buckle up your seat belt to experience the best truck cargo delivery simulator.
Features:

- Realistic truck physics
- Detailed interiors for each truck brand
- Amazing engine brakes and horns sound
- Different trucks to drive
- Challenging levels
- Tilting, buttons and steering wheel controls
